title.rendered: Sixers vs Thunder, Australian T20 League 2022: Fantasy Team, Pitch Report, Playing XIs & Fantasy Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Sixers: Josh Philippe (wk), Steven Smith, Kurtis Patterson, Moises Henriques (c), Jordan Silk, Hayden Kerr, Daniel Christian, Ben Dwarshuis, Sean Abbott, Steve O’Keefe, Todd Murphy

Thunder: Matthew Gilkes (wk), David Warner, Blake Nikitaras, Oliver Davies, Alex Ross, Daniel Sams, Ben Cutting, Nathan McAndrew, Chris Green (c), Usman Qadir, Brendan Doggett

Also Read:

India vs New Zealand, 2nd ODI, 2023: Fantasy Team

Pitch Report

Venue: Sydney Cricket Ground, Sydney

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 150

2nd innings average score: 139

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Josh Philippe’s both fifties of the season came at the SCG. Overall, he has churned out 778 runs including 9 fifties in 23 attempts.

Steven Smith too has venue numbers in his favour. His 499 runs have come at an excellent average of 38.

Sean Abbott, the highest wicket-taker at the venue, strikes at 12.6. In this season, he is yet to go wicketless here, overall managing 8 wickets in 4 games. Against Thunder, he has taken 19 wickets in 15 games.

In the previous game between these teams, Moises Henriques and Jordan Silk were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively. Henriques is also the top run-scorer against Thunder.

There are as many as 4 bowlers who have starred in the Ultimate Team in 4 of their last 5 games: Chris Green, Ben Dwarshuis, Steve O’Keefe, and Todd Murphy.

In the last 3 games, 27 of 39 wickets belonged to the pacers.
